data.title: Encampment Home
data.text:
Encampment challenges you. It pushes you so you’ll grow. Are you self-disciplined? Can you lead? Can you truly work as a team? These are some of the questions the cadre will help you answer for yourself as you participate in awesome, hands-on activities and tours. Specifically, our goal is to inspire you to

• develop leadership skills,

• learn about aviation, space, and technology,

• commit to a habit of regular exercise, and

• live the Core Values.

As cadets of the U.S. Air Force Auxiliary, your training will emphasize not only leadership and character, but fitness and STEM (science, technology, engineering, and math) as you explore career opportunities in those areas and so much more.

Financial Assistance Help with tuition and uniform expenses is available. Please see the Cadet Encampment Assistance Program page. CEAP opens on 1 March for Summer Encampments and 1 November for Winter Encampments. CAPP 150-12 Encampment and NCSA Marketing Playbook Encampment Webinars New! High-level guide to train encampment PAO staff, a framework for consistent and intentional communications. Click here for information on the Spring 24 Encampment Webinar Series. Encampment Curricula Overnight Lodging All training materials are available online. Click here for details on overnight activity lodging policies. Air Force Support for CAP Encampments Summer 20204 Encampment Memo Click here for a letter referencing 2024 Air Force support for CAP encampments. Click here for the Summer 2024 Encampment Memo #1

Winter Encampments

Encampments will be listed here as they are announced. All activities may be subject to change.

Directors of cadet programs, please register your encampment with us for inclusion on this page.

Wing

When: 28 December 2024 - 4 January 2025

Cadet Slots: 104

Cost: $325

Commander: Lt Col Donald Peacock

Note: Student applications will open around 15 Sep 2024. In-processing and out-processing will occur at Starbase, 2929 Scanlan Avenue, Salina, KS. Payment will be accepted via Registration Zone. Students will be entered into Registration Zone by the encampment staff once they are slotted. Students WILL NOT signup via the Registration Zone themselves.
